</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 90 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 85 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Quenching potion_ is a clear liquid that tastes like fresh, cool spring water. Drinking this potion or pouring it over yourself completely hydrates you and cleanses your system. Immediately attempt a [flat check](/Rules.aspx?ID=333) to end any [persistent acid, fire, poison, or void damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=86) affecting you, and attempt a new saving throw against any [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) affecting you. Poison can’t progress to a worse stage due to this saving throw. The potion counts as a particularly appropriate type of help against persistent acid, fire, poison, and void damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
